name: nox caelo
description:
Nox Caelo is a short text adventure/visual novel style game created by Evangeline Papanicola. Explore, fight monsters and meet new friends on your quest to find the ancient tomes. Can you save Luna?

Credits

Special thanks to AJ @ahosgood for all the coding help!

Open source imagery used:

  • Mountain Dusk Parallax Background by Ansimuz on itch.io
  • SunnyLand Forest by Ansimuz on itch.io
  • Pixelart Game Backgrounds by MobileGameGraphics on GameDev Market
  • Shikashi's Fantasy Icons Pack by Shikashiassets on itch.io

Shoutout to Ashley for aaaaallll the beta testing!
